name: Polo Blue Eau de Toilette
description:
Polo Blue Eau de Toilette - A Refreshing Aquatic Masterpiece

Experience the invigorating essence of Ralph Lauren Polo Blue, a captivating men's fragrance that embodies the spirit of freedom and adventure. This iconic blue cologne delivers a powerful blend of aquatic freshness and masculine energy that's perfect for the modern gentleman. âœ¨

Product Information

BrandRalph Lauren
Product TypeEau de Toilette
GenderMen
Size125ml
ConcentrationEau de Toilette

The Polo Blue Fragrance Journey

Top NotesMelon, Cucumber, Mandarin Orange, Bergamot ðŸŒ¿
Heart NotesBasil, Sage, Geranium ðŸŒ¸
Base NotesSuede, Musk, Woodsy Notes, Patchouli ðŸ’Ž

Key Features of Polo Blue EDT

  • Refreshing aquatic notes perfect for daytime and casual wear
  • Long-lasting fresh scent that evolves beautifully throughout the day ðŸ”¥
  • Iconic blue bottle design representing the oceanic inspiration
  • Versatile fragrance suitable for office, casual outings, and special occasions
  • Part of Ralph Lauren's prestigious Polo collection of fine fragrances

Launched in 2003, Polo Blue was created by master perfumer Carlos Benaim as a modern interpretation of the classic Polo fragrance line. The scent quickly became one of Ralph Lauren's best sellers, establishing itself as a cornerstone of contemporary men's fragrances with its perfect balance of freshness and sophistication. The distinctive blue bottle represents the oceanic inspiration behind this new arrival to the fragrance world. ðŸ’«

The aquatic cologne opens with crisp cucumber and juicy melon notes that create an immediate sense of refreshment. As it develops, herbaceous heart notes of basil and sage add complexity and masculine character, while the base of suede and musk provides a lasting foundation that's both sophisticated and sensual. Perfect for the man who appreciates luxury fragrances with a contemporary edge. âœ¨

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Polo Blue EDT last on skin?
Polo Blue Eau de Toilette typically lasts 6-8 hours on most skin types. As an EDT concentration, it delivers moderate longevity with a refreshing projection during the first 2-3 hours before settling into a more intimate scent. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points and moisturized skin. Many users report excellent performance in moderate weather conditions, making it ideal for spring and summer wear. ðŸŒ¿
short_description: Discover Ralph Lauren Polo Blue EDT, a refreshing aquatic fragrance for men featuring crisp cucumber, melon, and mandarin notes over a masculine base of suede and musk. This iconic blue cologne delivers invigorating freshness and sophisticated style for the modern adventurer.
